original_title: Animation Maverick: The Lou Scheimer Story
overview: Documentary profiling the life and career of Filmation Studios founder Lou Scheimer. As told by Lou himself, his daughter and his colleagues, we learn how he pioneered the animation industry in the '70s and '80s, for better or worse, based on his responsibilities to himself, his employees, the audience and the future of television animation.
title: Animation Maverick: The Lou Scheimer Story
